actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of any right, title, or interest which the United States may have in certain real property by the Secretary of the Interior to the city of Provo, Utah.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Provo, Utah, without consideration, all interest of the United States in specified lands.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of any right, title, or interest which the United States may have in certain real property by the Secretary of the Interior to the city of Provo, Utah.
